Title: Relates to a statewide referendum process for certain legislative proposals
Summary: Provides a process for the legislature to submit certain legislative proposals to the people for a statewide vote prior to enactment.
LawCode: Amd Art 3 ยง1, renum Art 20 to be Art 21; add Art 20, Constn
ActClause: Concurrent Resolution of the Senate and Assembly proposing an amendment to section 1 of article 3 of the constitution, in relation to submission of certain legislation to a statewide vote and adding a new article 20 relating thereto
